name: gitlab-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for fetching GitLab merge request diffs from your private GitLab instance
author: Danielsuri

tools.name: fetch_merge_request_diff
tools.description: Fetches the diff of a given merge request for a GitLab project

tools.name: get_merge_request_commentable_lines
tools.description: Gets a list of lines that can be commented on in a merge request diff

tools.name: add_merge_request_inline_comment
tools.description: Adds an inline comment to a specific line in a merge request diff

tools.name: add_merge_request_general_comment
tools.description: Adds a general comment to a merge request

environment.name: GITLAB_TOKEN
environment.description: Your GitLab personal access token with read_api scope
